test:
program A very simple program
  3 cycles Only cycle
    session A single session
      4 sets Push Up
        8 reps
        rest 30 seconds
    rest 1 days
  rest 1 days

program Hangboarding with infinite cycles
  * cycles
    session The hang sess.
      6 rounds
        1 sets Easy hold
          6 reps
            perform 7 seconds
            rest 3 seconds
        rest 2 minutes
        1 sets Hard hold
          6 reps
            perform 5 seconds
            rest 5 seconds
        rest 5 minutes
    rest 1 day

program Example of rotations
 * cycles
  def rotation Primary
